project.name: distributed-content-searching
project.description: A simple overlay-based solution that allows a set of nodes to share contents (e.g., music files) among each other. Consider a set of nodes connected via some overlay topology. Each of the nodes has a set of files that it is willing to share with other nodes. Suppose node x is interested in a file f. x issues a search query to the overlay to locate a at least one node y containing that particular file. Once the node is identified, the file f can be exchanged between X and y. https://github.com/Hashan-Rashmi-Perera/Distributed-Content-Searching-UOM
